# hide()

**Instance Method**

Attempts to hide or the application.

## Declaration

```swift
func hide() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the application was successfully hidden, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

The property of this value will be [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if the application has already quit, or if of a type that is unable to be hidden.

## Hiding and unhiding applications

- **unhide()**: Attempts to unhide or the application.
- **isHidden**: Indicates whether the application is currently hidden.
